Middle Class Income.title: Four charts: Unions needed for middle class, American dream
Middle Class Income.content: Another chart from the Center for American Progress backs up that point, showing how the income of the richest 1% has risen, as middle class incomes drop:

Middle Class Income.title: The declining middle class and fall of unions
Middle Class Income.content: A report on Wednesday from the Center For American Progress notes that as middle-class incomes have steadily fallen, so have union membership rates.

Middle Class Income.title: Collective Bargaining and the Fight Against Income Inequality
Middle Class Income.content: The erosion of collective bargaining is the single largest factor behind the stagnation of middle-class wages. As union membership rates declined, the share of income earned by middle-class households declined, too.

Middle Class Income.title: How Defunding Public Sector Unions Will Diminish Our Democracy
Middle Class Income.content: By the same token, as the Center for American Progress’s David Madland has vividly illustrated, the decline in union density in the United States between 1969 and 2009 has been accompanied by a strikingly similar decline in the share of income going to the middle class (the middle three-fifths of the income distribution; see Figure 1).

Middle Class Income.title: How Defunding Public Sector Unions Will Diminish Our Democracy
Middle Class Income.content: By the same token, as the Center for American Progress’s David Madland has vividly illustrated, the decline in union density in the United States between 1969 and 2009 has been accompanied by a strikingly similar decline in the share of income going to the middle class (the middle three-fifths of the income distribution; see Figure 1).

Middle Class Income.title: Collective Bargaining and the Fight Against Income Inequality
Middle Class Income.content: The erosion of collective bargaining is the single largest factor behind the stagnation of middle-class wages. As union membership rates declined, the share of income earned by middle-class households declined, too.
